companyDescription.description:
Please provide a brief company description covering the following points:

The nature of the business (primary activity, incl. products and services, that generate the majority of revenue and primary lines of businesses) and the marketplace needs that the company is trying to satisfy, or for holding companies those of the securities it holds (please include industry classification code where available e.g. NAIC)

regulator.description: if the business is regulated, select the regulator (FINMA)

countryOperations.description: Select the countries in which the entity maintains significant operations

OFACSanctionScreening.description: Please advise in case the company, including any subsidiaries and affiliates, engages in or expect to engage in activity with a Sanctioned Country/Region (current OFAC Sanctioned Countries/Regions are Cuba, Iran, Syria, Sudan, Crimea and North Korea (countries may be subject to change)
OFACSanctionScreening.title: OFAC Sanction Screening

holdingCompany.description:
**Is this entity a holding company?**


- No, as it is primarily engaged in administering, overseeing, and managing other establishments of the company or enterprise or securities it holds (Operating company)
- Yes, it is primarily engaged in holding the securities or other equity interest companies and enterprises for the purpose of owning a controlling interest or influencing the management decisions of these forms

AdditionalAssetsAndRevenue.description: provide total assets and total revenue of the legal entity (where financials not available in support documents)

PartnerLocations.description: describe and provide geographic location significant supplier and vendor

Ownership.description: confirm ownership up to ultimate parent level

BearerSharesIssued.description: Have Bearer Shares of 10% or more been issued by the customer

BearerShares.description: Are Bearer Shares permitted by the customer?

name.description: Name of individual who is the beneficial owner

usTaxId.description: U.S. taxpayer identification number (SSN or ITIN)

citizenDetails.title: Part I Identification of Beneficial Owner

certifyThisResidency.description: I certify that the beneficial owner is a resident of the country above within the meaning of the income tax treaty between the United States and that country

paragraph.description: The beneficial owner is claiming the provisions of Article and paragraph above of the treaty identified above

percentWithholding.description: The beneficial owner is claiming the % rate below of withholding on:

typeOfIncome.description: The beneficial owner is claiming the % rate of withholding for the income of type

additionalConditions.description: Explain the additional conditions in the Article and paragraph the beneficial owner meets to be eligible for the rate of withholding

claim_group.title: Part II - Claim of Tax Treaty Benefits

claim.title: Part II - Claim of Tax Treaty Benefits

fullName.description: Under penalties of perjury, I declare that I have examined the information on this form and to the best of my knowledge and belief it is true, correct, and complete. I further certify under penalties of perjury that:

actingCapacity.description: Capacity in which acting (if form is not signed by beneficial owner)

name.description: Name of organization that is the beneficial owner

citizenDetails.title: Part I Identification of Beneficial Owner

fullName.description: Name (as shown on your income tax return)

businessName.description: Business name/disregarded entity name, if different from above

socialSecurityNumber.description: Enter your Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) in the appropriate box. The TIN provided must match the name given on line 1 to avoid backup withholding. For individuals, this is generally your social security number (SSN)

employeeIdentificationNumber.description: For other entities, it is your employer identification number (EIN)

enum.id: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines - FSA
enum.title: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines - FSA

taxDeclaration.description:
**To comply with tax laws**
 we’re required to ask our customers specific questions about their organisations. In 2016, did your organisation earn 50% or more of its gross income from dividends, interest, rents, royalties or similar sources?

assetDeclaration.description: Are 50% or more of your organisation's assets held in real estate, bank accounts, shares, stocks, bonds, intellectual property or similar income-producing investments?

notForProfit.description: Is your organisation a not-for-profit organisation that meets all of these requirements? It operates only for religious, charitable, scientific, artistic, cultural or educational purposes. It is exempt from income tax. It has no owners who are entitled to its income or assets, even if it is dissolved.

beneficialOwners.description: Does your organisation have beneficial owners who own or control, directly or indirectly, more than 10% of shares, voting rights or profit and capital interests in your organisation?

mifidProduct.title: Is this for a MIFID product?

tradle.CRS-Individual-1.title: Part 1 – Identification of Individual Account Holder

nameDetails.title: Part I Identification of Beneficial Owner

tradle.CRS-Individual-2.title: Part 2 – Country of Residence for Tax Purposes

NoTIN.description: Select reason if you can't supply a Taxpayer Identification Number or equivalent number

reasonForB.description: If you selected Reason B explain why you are unable to obtain a TIN

enum.title: Reason A - The country where the Account Holder is liable to pay tax does not issue TINs to its residents
Reason B - The Account Holder is otherwise unable to obtain a TIN or equivalent number(Please explain why you are unable to obtain a TIN in the below table if you have selected this reason)
Reason C - No TIN is required.

declaration.title: Declaration
declaration.description:
I understand that the information supplied by me is covered by the full provisions of the terms and conditions governing the Account Holder’s relationship with [the FI] setting out how [the FI] may use and share the information supplied by me.

 I acknowledge that the information contained in this form and information regarding the Account Holder and any Reportable Account(s) may be provided to the tax authorities of the country in which this account(s) is/are maintained and exchanged with tax authorities of another country or countries in which the Account Holder may be tax resident pursuant to intergovernmental agreements to exchange financial account information. 

 I certify that I am the Account Holder (or am authorised to sign for the Account Holder) of all the account(s) to which this form relates. 

 I declare that all statements made in this declaration are, to the best of my knowledge and belief, correct and complete. 

  I undertake to advise [FI’s name] within [XX] days of any change in circumstances which affects the tax residency status of the individual identified in Part 1 of this form or causes the information contained herein to become incorrect or incomplete, and to provide [FI’s name] with a suitably updated self-certification and Declaration within [up to XX] days of such change in circumstances.

capacity.description: Note: If you are not the Account Holder please indicate the capacity in which you are signing the form. If signing under a power of attorney please also attach a certified copy of the power of attorney.

corporationOfStock.description: a corporation the stock of which is regularly traded on an established securities market or a corporation which is a related entity of such a corporation

securitiesMarket.description: If you have checked 'A Corporation of Stock', please provide the name of the established securities market on which the corporation is regularly traded

tradedCorporation.description: If you are a Related Entity of a regularly traded corporation, please provide the name of the regularly traded corporation that the Entity is a Related Entity of
